subTitle: Are you ready to buy and ship?
title: Become member of My Cargo US!
content:
Become a Member of My Cargo US and send your packages and cargo at good prices in just one click!. Compare and generate your purchases online, from Stores in the US, for your home, business or office.

To get started, choose now a membership that suits your shipping needs, completely free!

memberships.title: Standard
memberships.desc: With the standard Membership, you can enjoy the following benefits:
benefits: International Locker in Miami and New York

memberships.title: Premium
memberships.desc: With the premium Membership, you can enjoy all the benefits of Standard membership plus:

memberships.title: Cargo
memberships.desc: With the cargo Membership, you can enjoy all the benefits of Premium membership plus:
benefits: High volume of packages and cargo
